title: IBBI: A Python package for the detection and classification of bark and ambrosia beetles
description: The Intelligent Bark Beetle Identifier (IBBI) is an open-source Python package that provides a simple, unified interface for the automated detection and classification of bark and ambrosia beetles from images.

creators.name: Marais, Christopher
